disclosures.entity: Tristan Cockman v Australian Labor Party
disclosures.details: I am a defendant in a civil proceeding initiated by Tristan Cockman against members of the Australian Labor Party (WA Branch) relating to the Party's decision not to endorse him as a candidate for Cowan at the 2016 federal election. While I have already disclosed my membership of the Australian Labor Party (WA Branch) and while I do not see how a perceived conflict could arise, for completeness I also declare that the Australian Labor Party (WA Branch) is covering the legal costs of this matter.
Tickets from the Tourism Council of WA for myself and my wife to attend the The Perth Airport WA Tourism Awards on 13 November 2021.
Credit Card from Qantas Money.
